title: Process a Required Minimum Distribution (RMD)
description: An IRA holder held within an annuity has reached the age where they must begin taking RMDs.

tasks.description: Identify the contract holder and calculate their RMD for the year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the amount the customer must withdraw.

tasks.description: Notify the customer of their RMD amount and the deadline to take it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a clear notification to the customer.

tasks.description: Process the RMD withdrawal as requested by the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully distributes the RMD amount.
